name: Grapple Frog (Dumont Parker Studios)
description:
Grapple Up! Play as Frog Ninja and use your incredible strong tongue to grapple on moving platforms and travel your way up. Snatch food and other items to give temporary boost to better your chances of survival, but be careful. One wrong move will make you fall to your unfortunate death. Power Up!

On you way up and up, use your tongue to grab power up to assist you in your adventure. Some will give you longer reach while might slow down platforms.

Controls Keyboard:

Use A on keyboard to move Left

Use D on keyboard to move right

Left Click on Mouse to grapple on to platforms

Mobile:

Use Left Arrow button to move left

Use Right Arrow button to move right

Tap on the platforms to grapple on to them

Early Build Currently this game is a very early build. There will be bugs and visual glitch but I do intend on fixes them soon. I might created a better grappling mechanic if it better the experience of the game. There will be much more to come like power ups, Particle effects, different type of platforms, maybe different ninja frogs. If you have an ideas please leave  a comment and I will happily take it into consideration
